about.title: About
about.p1: Hi — I'm Bruno Sistiaga, a 3D Environment Artist specialized in creating spaces with strong atmospheric presence and attention to detail. I work the full pipeline: modeling, texturing, lighting and composition.
about.p2: Experience producing environments for games and cinematics. I focus on visual storytelling and real-time optimization.
